original_text: And it waxed great, even to the host of heaven; and it cast down some of the host and of the stars to the ground, and stamped upon them.
korean_text: 그것이 하늘 군대에 미칠 만큼 커져서 그 군대와 별들 중의 몇을 땅에 떨어뜨리고 그것들을 짓밟고

sentences.original_text: even to the host of heaven
and it cast down some of the host
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그 군대 중 일부를 땅에 던지고

sentences.original_text: and of the stars to the ground
